post.title: picture attributes of sx 110 is
post.content: hi gurus, i have taken a lot of pictures using the camera canon sx 110 is, but i cannot remember which attributes i used to capture those pictures. is there any way that i could get this information from the pictures in the camera? or do i have to note down the settings that we change/make when taking a shot? please reply, much appreciated and thanks in advance, suresh.
